prompt: Design a Terms & Conditions screen with a clean, nature-inspired theme. The app bar is forest green with a bold centered white title and back arrow. The scrollable section uses a light green background, showing terms in dark green with 1.6 line spacing inside a rounded card with subtle shadow. The sticky footer has 'Decline' (light green border, dark green text) left and 'Accept' (forest green background, white text) right. Use generous padding for a fresh, responsive design.
